title: Perfect Chaos
description: My life is far from perfect, but he’s thrown it into undeniable chaos.He doesn’t know me at all.Yet he strikes out at every opportunity.His cruel words tear me down.But his touch sets me on fire.He plays with my heart and makes me ache.And I know it’s wrong, but I love the way he hates me.WARNING: Shadow River Elite is a New Adult/College Bully series of standalones filled with drama, angst, and bully bad boys. If you’re not into romances where hate turns into love, this might not be the series for you. This series is recommended for mature readers due to graphic language, dark elements, and sexual content.
author: Leila James
